oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.tile
Interface Tile

public interface Tile

An interface for defining a Tile. A Tile is a UI artifact shown to the user so they can see the current search filters, and to allow selections from LOVs so they can pick new Search criteria.

Since:
11.1.1.7.2
Version:
$Header: atgpf/applcore/applications/UIComponents/ViewController/src/oracle/apps/fnd/applcore/globalSearch/ui/tile/Tile.java /st_atgpf_11.1.1.7.2/1 2013/06/21 17:11:54 dagroves Exp $

Method Summary
 java.util.List<TilePart> getParts()
          Get the parts to a Tile.
 boolean isHidden()
          Is this tile hidden in the UI?
 

Method Detail

getParts

java.util.List<TilePart> getParts()
Get the parts to a Tile. Each Tile must gave 1 or more parts.

Returns:
List of at least 1 Tile Part.

isHidden

boolean isHidden()
Is this tile hidden in the UI?

Returns:
true is to be hidden, false otherwise.
